title: How do I deposit in my GSave Overseas account?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I apply for a GSave Overseas account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38547564790809-How-do-I-apply-for-a-GSave-Overseas-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To deposit funds into your GSave Overseas account follow the steps below:

1\. On your GSave by CIMB dashboard, select **Deposit**

2\. Enter the amount you want to deposit and tap **Next**

3\. Review and confirm the amount you want to deposit. Tap **Confirm**

After depositing, you'll see a confirmation page. The money will be instantly deducted from your GCash wallet and transferred to your GSave account.
